config.EnableMod.name: EnableMod
config.EnableMod.description: Enable or disable the mod; disabling it will deactivate all of its features.
config.EnableTexture.name: EnableTexture
config.EnableTexture.description: Enable or disable textures; if there is a conflict with other visual enhancement mods, you can disable them.
config.EnableFont.name: EnableFont
config.EnableFont.description: Enable or disable fonts; if there is a conflict with other font mods, you can disable them.
config.Font.name: Font
config.Font.description: To change the font, if you encounter garbled text, please restart the game or switch to another language and then back to Chinese.
